data.name: PAYDAY 2: McShay Weapon Pack 2
data.detailed_description: Our partnership with Gemma McShay keeps on giving. This time we got the chance to improve our arsenal with a revolver and a shotgun, both available in akimbo. And a brand new prototype weapon.
data.about_the_game: Our partnership with Gemma McShay keeps on giving. This time we got the chance to improve our arsenal with a revolver and a shotgun, both available in akimbo. And a brand new prototype weapon.
data.short_description: The McShay Weapon Pack 2 contains a revolver and a shotgun, both available in akimbo. And a brand new prototype weapon.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7
  • Processor:2 GHz Intel Dual Core Processor
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia & AMD (512MB VRAM)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Storage:83 GB available space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 10
  • Processor:2.3 GHz Intel Quad Core Processor
  • Memory:8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia & AMD (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Storage:83 GB available space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
